name: Bulldozer (itch) (Dafna Noiman)
description:
The bulldozer

A game that puts you in the driver's seat of a powerful bulldozer. As the operator of this massive machine, you will have to deal with new rule. 

Languages: Hebrew. 

Donations: All proceeds will be used to save the democracy 

Controls

[Mouse] 

Guidance

Made as part of  Art and interaction course by lecturer Danny Bacon and Rutu Modan in Bezalel Academy of Arts and design.
